name: Decision-tree-result
body:
# rid|runwalk

## fea12
 
# not ensemble

### 1)fea12  removed after each tree generated,stop when fea12 exhausted

try10times average 0.865625   max 0.911458333333 min 0.8515625


### 2)fea12 not removed after each tree generated,stop when maxdepth
* maxDep 6 try10times averag 0.871614583333 max 0.8828125       min 0.861979166667
* maxDep 8 try10times averag 0.879947916667 max 0.90625         min 0.859375
* maxDep 10 try10times averag 0.883333333333 max 0.908854166667 min 0.84375

* maxDep 28 try10times averag 0.880208333333 max 0.908854166667 min 0.864583




# Now ensemble with fea not removed ,maxdep=20~110... ok,usually stop at 8 9 10
try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.884114583333 min max 0.8515625 0.9166






#
# run|walk
## fea4x3
